item.title: Making a proper ::hit command?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“hit”)) {
{
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

						p
								.sendMessage("A staff member has chocked you, can you still breathe?");
						p.animation(59, absY, absX);
						p.pEmote = 528;
						p.iceBarrage();
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME");
				}

			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Making a proper ::hit command?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Can someone help fix this? It only does the animation on the person doing the command. I want it the other way around…

Here’s the command.

			if (command.startsWith("hit")) {
				{
					try {
						String otherPName = command.substring(4);
						int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

						if (otherPIndex != -1) {
							client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

							p.sendMessage("A staff member chokes you, can you still breathe?");
							setAnimation(287, absY, absX);
							p.iceBarrage();
							p.updateRequired = true;
							p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
						}
					} catch (Exception e) {
						sendMessage("Use as ::hit PLAYERNAME");
					}

				}
			}

Reward for helper!

Read full topic
